**Hymns of the Three Caverns: Divine Chapters**

**Title:** *Hymns of the Three Caverns: Divine Chapters*. Three fascicles. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, "Hymns and Eulogies" section of the *Dongzhen* Department.

**Fascicle One**

**Hymn to the Life-Bestowing Command of Jade Purity**
I bow my head to the Most High Lord of Jade Purity,
I bow my head to the Emperor of Golden Towers and the Void.
Encompassing creation, moving yin and yang,
In its ultimate state, naturally free from stagnation.
Giving birth to heaven, earth, and all beings,
Five-colored auspicious radiance follows wisdom everywhere.
Delivering countless beings beyond thought or measure,
I dare to rely on this auspicious light for salvation.
I surrender my life to the Venerable One in the Eastern Palace,
I surrender my life to the Saviors of the Ten Directions.
Subtle radiance pervades the three thousand worlds,
Wisdom silently penetrates the five gates of suffering.
Ever with vast and mighty divine power,
Compassionately saving the suffering and delivering the lost souls.
Guiding the lost from evil paths to return to the True,
The great Dharma Bridge of deliverance endures forever.

**Mysterious Petition to the Flower Canopy and the True Congealed Qi**
The hidden and subtle Palace of the Pistil is the immortal’s abode,
The Dao pierces the pivot of spirit, the white radiance of the perfect sphere.
Flying roots scatter leaves on kingfisher branches,
Wondrous qi of the Three Flowers penetrates the profound and clear.
Lush and numinous, the pure land of the Perfected,
Clouds and light surge forth in dazzling brilliance.
The Three and Five unite with the divine mushroom in the Mud Pill Palace,
Stringing pearls to secure the spirit and enliven the qi.
Flying mists and wondrous vapors dispel lingering misfortune,
Refining and attaining flight as immortals to escape calamity.
Great Mystery and Great Harmony reside in the Right Mansion,
The Perfected of Purple Clarity preside over the Dao.
Within emptiness, tranquility, and contentment, naturally at ease,
Reversing age to return to the womb, guiding to the Mystic Garden.
Knowing the masculine, guarding the feminine, drawing on celestial mechanism,
Reversing and returning, the ruler stabilizes the center of heaven and earth.
Flying mystery and divine qi merge with the Azure Mystery,
Holding the elixir, exhaling fragrance, illuminating the midnight and noon.
Refining and nurturing the numinous root so it never withers,
The ten thousand spirits gather, the host of yin beholds.
Jade frost and resonant tones bathe the dead body,
Wandering in silence, the cycle must be universal.
Seizing the dragon, capturing the tiger, seated in the whirlwind chariot,
Hidden rhymes and flowing sounds roam the wondrous mansion.
Yellow blossoms and vermilion nectar lave the yang essence,
The myriad Dao’s qi uplifts the assembly of immortals.

**Mysterious Qi Gathers the Flying Radiance of Wondrous Flowers**
The Dao pierces the Azure Mystery, gathering pristine auspiciousness,
Numinous Treasure and flying Perfected merge with jade-like wondrous qi.
Nurturing the hun and fostering the po to return to golden countenance,
The five viscera bloom with splendor, congealing radiant verdancy.
The Three Fields soar in lushness, reflecting the Flowery Peaks,
Precious luminaries of the mysterious and yellow stand in solemn assembly.
Lifting the sun and moon, moving the pivot of the celestial sphere,
The Nine Qi herald spring, unfolding the earth.
Holding harmony, exhaling pistils, illuminating the golden lotus,
The black dragon spits pearls, displaying iridescent wings.
Phoenixes sing and soar, facing the honored guests,
Tigers roar in the empty cliffs, their splendor resplendent.
Gazing through the Three Realms, the hundred passages shine clearly,
The six wefts and seven warp threads align heaven and earth.
Flying spirits and radiant scenes cast forth fiery numina,
The Eastern Well and Celestial River bathe the hidden and dark.
Nine dragons leap and bound through the soaring Treasure Garden,
Circular radiance blazes in total brilliance, all reins raised.
Flying rosy clouds gather, chewing the jade root,
Scene after scene, womb immortals give birth to the myriad forms.
A thousand calamities vanish, crushing malevolence,
The hidden chamber’s light—what can strike it?
Purple blossoms merge with the Azure Mystery Palace,
Lightning flashes, thunder rushes, crimson clouds conceal.
The Cloud Terrace and Azure Vault, grains of millet pearls,
Guiding and illuminating the luminous Mystery, the Two Qi shine.
Focusing thought on the Left Mansion, awakening to the Mystic Mechanism,
Reversing and cycling yin and yang to attain the highest rank.

**Hymn to the Lord of the Nine Qi of Azure Numinosity**
The Eastern Flowery emits numinous phoenixes,
The Western Palace strikes jade-like tones.
The Three Qi knit the empty cavern,
The Great Void gives birth to the center.
Numinous scriptures unfold in seven strips,
Treasure texts flourish in the verdant forest.
Phoenix blessings follow the celestial resonance,
The six hours chant in harmony with the seasons.
Above, the Youth Who Delivers Lives,
Illuminating the long night, dispelling the dark.
Through ten thousand kalpas, preserving the luminous form,
Vast and distant, none can seek it.
Forever refining the undying years,
Floating and sinking with the course of fate.
Sun and moon shine upon the numinous soul,
The pivot of the celestial sphere turns to the southeast.
The Nine Stars cast their forms and shadows,
Treasure flowers bloom in the five hearts.
Naturally possessing the undecaying spirit,
It harmonizes with me like cinnabar and gold.
The Red Script inspects the qi of the registers,
Jade formulas wondrously declare themselves.
The Vermilion Palace holds the Green Registers,
Demons and spirits dare not invade.

**Hymn to the Lord of the Three Qi of Cinnabar Numinosity**
Crimson clouds and jade-like emptiness,
Numinous winds unfold the Great Subtlety.
Vast and distant, the Six Qi descend,
Subtle and faint, they exhale numinous radiance.
Riding my shadow at midday,
I rein in and follow heaven’s revolution.
The Vermilion Youth dons the numinous night,
Refining the Yang Cavern, tempering the setting sun.
Jade chapters deliver the hastened years,
Numinous songs open the five spirits.
Endless waves without ceasing,
A single thought enters the Nine Enclosures.
Through countless kalpas, transcending the hidden ages,
The flowery life does not decay or decline.
Flying immortals traverse the layered barriers,
The Southern Palace illuminates the mechanisms of misfortune.
The Vermilion Mound establishes the crimson registers,
Spirits prepare, enabling the body to fly.
Seven ancestors ascend to heaven,
Their blessings and virtues towering and majestic.
The wheel turns the empty cavern soul,
Emerging from my Ninefold Mystery’s gate.
Night’s radiance dons the morning sun,
Floating and floating, riding the course to return.

**Hymn to the Lord of the Seven Qi of Radiant Numinosity**
The Kun Terrace births jade-like tones,
Jade qi reaches the distant Seven Darknesses.
Treasure chapters pierce the Great Void,
Drawing the true into formlessness.
Broidered clouds and crimson sun,
Circular blossoms follow the moon’s birth.
Merging with the qi of spontaneity,
Vast and distant, the Ninefold Mystery is pure.
Six wisdoms, pure Brahman conduct,
Five spirits possess lofty numinosity.
The Crimson Mansion shines with vermilion radiance,
Through ten thousand kalpas, undecaying and unscattered.
Ever abiding, the Lord Who Loves Life,
The Great One unites with the Yellow Tranquility.
Preserving life, delivering the talismanic registers,
Refining the hun in the Golden Flower Court.
Guiding to return to the undying qi,
Floating and floating, riding the course to life.
The Seven Mysteries enter the Southern Palace,
Withered bones become fresh and flourishing.
Ever joyful, ascending the floating clouds,
Soaring high, playing in the painted chariot.
Carefree beyond the Great Veil,
The Three Realms cannot slight it.

**Hymn to the Lord of the Five Qi of Mysterious Numinosity**
Flying steps enter the Northern Clarity,
Grasping the true, summoning the Supreme Prime.
Riding the radiance, gazing toward the Mysterious Terrace,
Four blossoms birth broidered clouds.
Within, the mushroom-gathering youth,
Feathered robes—how they flutter!
Singing the long song of the Ninefold Life Registers,
The Golden Record and Red Script texts.
Ten absolutes, the distant Flowery Court,
Floating and floating, delivering the banner of life.
The green canopy rides the wind in return,
The Cinnabar Empyrean bows to the jasper carriage.
For me, creating the Supreme August,
Extracting the records from the Nine Night Gates.
Delivering life at the Vermilion Mound’s gate,
Forever preserving the kalpas’ stake.
Leaving the spirit to tend the Crimson Mansion,
The Red Child illuminates the Mysterious Pass.
Receiving the form of the undying qi,
Naturally giving birth to the treasure soul.

The Seven Ancestors cross the Southern Palace,
Generation upon generation, the gate of fortune and blessing.

**Green Mystery’s True Qi Guides the Soul Chapter**
The Jade Capital, myriad dharmas, Great Luo’s Honored One,
A thousandfold jeweled mantras, ten thousand mysteries’ words.
Azure radiance and crimson clouds lead the host of Dao,
Jade towers and golden caskets unfold the true texts.
Supreme Perfected recline in soaring flight through the void,
The eight poles’ flying spirits cross boundless realms.
Lush and luminous within the myriad qi,
Voices like infants’—qi forms patterns.
Vibrating Brahma Heaven, the empty Dao,
Serene and bright, the Dharma’s radiance is only compassion’s clouds.
Transcending the dark crossroads of Northern Feng,
Inscribed upon golden tablets, returning to numinous clarity.
The blazing Fire Pool becomes cool and refreshing,
Blades unbind, edges dull—all shatter and scatter.
Dispersing karmic realms, the Dharmakāya is empty,
Summoning the nature of sins to our altar.
The Heavenly Honored’s governance knows no bounds,
Myriad heavens, myriad lands—all become true origin.
None exist who are not transformed and delivered,
Transcending the Three Realms to assist the Void Mystery.
Following the heart’s call, returning as the heart desires,
Immortal trust, Brahma’s sound like sweet springs.
At first hearing, the hundred bones dissolve heat and vexation,
Zhuling opens the crossing—becoming flying mystery.
The Great Dao transcends the mundane, entering compassion,
No washing of great or small—only light and fleet.
China’s cool clarity guides your soul,
Carefree and solitary, stepping the Purple Void Heaven.

**Golden Perfection Chapter**
Heavenly demons ride the void, erupting,
Myriad spirits startle the divine court.
Entrusted with transformation’s ballad and hymn,
Following change, entering namelessness.
Clamor and dust—how tangled,
Defiled paths arise along the way.
Clouds gather, forming crimson skies,
The Northern Emperor surges forth divine soldiers.
The drum’s limit knows the Dao,
Mysterious fate comes to summon.
Upper luminants mount flying reins,
Swift chariots inspect the cloud camps.
Urging the Northern Emperor’s records,
Seizing and binding the host of demons’ brightness.
Vast and open, spreading Heaven’s net,
Unleashing might, hurling streaming bells.
Golden perfection guards the empty cavern,
Jade light illumines the eight darknesses.
Golden talismans guard the upper palace,
Divine essence slays celestial spirits.
Severing the myriad demonic qi,
Countless as tortoises’ ages.
Upholding the Nine Heavens’ trust,
Whistling commands—none do not yield.
Summoning Perfected, exploring the Three Caverns,
Kind recitation—bright as the sun’s clarity.
Eight paths gaze toward the mysterious radiance,
Seven revolutions weave the Heavenly Canon,
Caverns unite with the Emperor’s One Truth,
Delivering the Seven Ancestors’ journey.
Cutting away the five sufferings’ roots,
Returning souls receive glory’s mantle.
Golden light shines in the silent chamber,
Divine candles naturally arise.
Fragrant flowers scatter the Jade Universe,
Mist and qi penetrate the Jade Capital.
The Emperor dispatches the lingering ranks,
Three Primes descend in green chariots.
Swift chariots ascend the Nine Mysteries,
Paying court to our Jade Emperor’s court.
Mysterious sleeves flutter cloud sleeves,
Flying through the void—joy without end.
High-stepping the Seven Jeweled Grove,
Carefree along Heaven’s long thoroughfare.
Far-off Jade Capital Mountain,
Jasper terraces gleam with flying beams.
Gazing up at the golden palaces,
Looking down at the white jade couches.
Within sits the Yellow and Old Lord,
Purple qi revolves Heaven’s canon.
Reclining, he holds the Register of Life,
Green brush records the Flourishing Yang.
For ten thousand kalpas, endless duration,
Transcending the realm of no death.
Cloud thoroughfares glow with bright radiance,
Jasper fields plant purple mushrooms.
Divine winds soar the high clarity,
Clangorous sounds—how mournful!
Three blossoms cover the eight circles,
Brahma’s qi envelops the mysterious mechanism.
The utmost Dao joins the vast and empty,
Summoning Perfected, soaring on clouds.
Chanting and singing—joyful and resplendent,
Langfeng reflects Kun Pond.
Below dwell the Summoning Immortals,
For a thousand kalpas, playing in cloud robes.
Ageless, roaming the myriad heavens,
The ten poles nest in cloud and mist.
Purple canopies urge divine banners,
Crimson radiance illumines the Clear Subtlety.
Yu Yi shines on the Cinnabar Ultimate,
Jie Lin glows with mysterious splendor.
Divine winds embrace the Three Primes,
Nine Elders wave cloud banners.
Looking up and down in the layered skies,
Feasting in the service of numinous emptiness.
Escorting the dawn to the Jade Guests,
Western Florescence arrays the high steps.
Graceful, the Square Vases Palace,
Azure lads tread the cloud steps.
Turning steps, singing the Red Phoenix,
Brightly feeding, riding clouds in flight.
Western feasts by Jasper Pool’s edge,
Eastern wanderings at Penglai’s ford.
In an instant, crossing Mulberry Fields,
Yang Valley glows with crimson dawn.
Dragon banners trail through a thousand groves,
Jeweled canopies wheel the Nine Perfected.
Streaming bells gleam in the Central Yellow.
Grasping the tally, dispelling demonic mists.
Myriad immortals clap hands and laugh,
Clear songs vast and boundless.
Craning to gaze at the Great Nonbeing,
Equal in age to the Supreme’s guests.
Inspecting immortals, honoring the Emperor’s One,
Golden script’s wondrous feminine and masculine.
Soaring high, joining the Eight Primes,
Merging the hundred spirits’ merits.
Two Elders and two Immortal Kings,
Five Numinous tally with the registers.
Divine light shines on the golden towers,
Wondrous indeed—cloud qi layered.
This is called the Great Cavern’s Dharma,
Nine Perfected step the mysterious void.
Golden nectar harmonizes jade liquid,
Swallowing and serving the lush jasper trees.
Lush Luo pays court to the Supreme,
Sleeves raised, singing Heaven’s winds.
Riding mist, befriending rosy clouds,
Reins in hand, singing the vast and leisurely.
Northward ascending the Vast Cold Palace,
Mysterious flourishing—jade-polished countenances.
Flying steps above the Heavenly Ford,
Cloud zithers sound, drums resound.
Dragon chariots harness tiger steeds,
Morning salutations to Fusang’s sun.
Evening rests in the jasper grove’s shadows,
Guiding and leading the Nine Mysteries.
Roaming the Great Void’s halls,
Lingering, moving the crimson wheels.
Receiving the scriptures, ascending Southern Cinnabar,
Singing long songs for a hundred million springs.
Morning ascends the Supreme Subtlety Palace,
Evening rests at the Constant Yang Terrace.
Heavenly winds fan cool clarity,
Urging the chariot, returning on fivefold clouds.
Star pearls array the azure Han,
Graceful, flowing through the ninefold hangs.
Vast and boundless, riding bright mist,
Round skies feast at the jade steps.
Divine tigers seize the myriad demons,
Numinous might shines majestically.
Golden perfection inspects the cloud camps,
Jade chambers reflect the numinous stairs.
Cinnabar Mound’s round and square,
Wondrous indeed—the immortals’ talents!
Sailing radiance, feasting in Purple Clarity,
Cloud banners cherish the Cinnabar Empyrean.
Gazing afar at the Jasper Terrace,
How distant—Heaven’s Fishing!
Flowing winds illumine the soaring trees,
Divine light shines on the jasper towers.
Inhaling the mysterious pearl’s blossoms,
Golden script glows on the layered isles.
Myriad heavens bow to the Four August Ones,
Feathered sandals turn the misty chariots.
Eight Floating Luo phoenix canopies,
Jade trees’ radiance flies in the whirlwind.
Rosy ponds gird the divine precincts,
A thousand ages like a single dawn.
Jewel-like, magnificent in the morning,
Nine distances transcend the non-smoke.
Leftward, summoning Non-Brightness,
Rightward, bowing to White Prime.
Divine light mounts the mysterious primes,
Yellow and Old Lord bends over the mushroom fields.
Auspicious light harnesses the flying chariot,
Playing and controlling the flowing chariots.
High August One visits Purple Tenuity,
Vast and bright, roaming the myriad heavens.

The seasons of spring and autumn know no decay,
Through a thousand kalpas, endless distant years.
The Perfect Truth seeks nothing to attain,
Yet bears aloft the radiant immortal spirits.

**Hymn to the Azure Emperor**
Eastward I gaze and bow again,
To the Azure Emperor, Jade Sovereign Lord.
Divine winds stir the bellows and pipes,
Nurturing all things with primal spring’s spread.
Cloud-dragons harness the solemn chariot,
Jade guards escort the jasper wheels.
Withered sprouts revive with dewy grace,
Great kindness flows without distinction.
Myriad immortals chant the Dao’s song,
In winding counsel warning gods and men.
The root of the heart, deluded, clings fast—
Hands clasped, kneeling, we bear vast benevolence.

**Hymn to the White Emperor**
Six Jia spirits embrace the golden gates,
Seven Governors guard the sacred altar.
Flying bells cast forth fiery transformations,
Mighty swords coil with giant dragons.
That distant, pure, numinous Perfected—
Who dares defy their luminous decree?
They bind and subdue demonic spirits,
As frigid winds howl through the celestial frost.
Once baleful qi is stilled,
The myriad heavens swiftly find peace.
The true companions bear great shelter,
Kowtowing, they chant in joyous praise.

**Hymn to the Red Emperor**
The Grand Light opens the jade pivot,
The cavernous hall unfolds its golden steps.
Soaring forests shade the jasper terraces,
Crimson simurghs tread the jade trees.
Precious chambers, resplendent in winding beauty,
Luminous pendants mark where gods reside.
Wandering freely through cloud-wrought paths,
The gaze lingers on the Perfected Capital.
The celestial sun knows no dusk,
Layered mists veil the azure abode.
The Supreme Lord’s seal unfurls,
Silk and bamboo bear the writ divine.

**Hymn to the Black Emperor**
Without form, he governs all things,
Abyssal—O heart of the Supreme Lord.
The Dao neither opens nor reveals,
Its wondrous workings deep in mystery’s weave.
Lest your thoughts leak unfinished,
Dark musings suddenly spread and seep.
The wheel turns the boundless waves,
Bitter paths entangle and mislead.
For ten thousand years, ever vigilant,
Yet in a single day, self-drowned and lost.
Without equanimity, you fall to ghostly realms,
Calamity’s reproach cannot be borne.

**Hymn to the Yellow Emperor**
The myriad heavens bow to the Central Palace,
Reining chariots at the Jade Pool’s root.
The trigger mechanism spans countless eons,
Luminous and vast, it opens the four gates.
The Great Possession blends with the August Perfected,
Subduing the souls of stars and constellations.
Without the Emperor, the Dao does not turn—
All directions depend on his presence.
Wrath and fury bring frosty autumn,
Harmony and joy make spring’s warmth.
Creation and completion grasp the primal record,
Gazing upward, we bear boundless grace.

**Azure Emperor’s Hymn of Demon-Quelling**
Luminous brilliance nurtures primal essence,
Azure splendor unfolds great clarity.
It spreads and fosters the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Giving birth to the first offerings of Non-Brightness.
Supporting yang, it governs and commands,
Cinnabar groves unite with the host of Perfected.
Accumulated dawn’s radiance ascends,
Lush and layered, bright clouds quake.
Divine light illumines the net of stars,
Guarding and nurturing form and soul.
Blended transformations merge with the mysterious scene,
Benevolence and kindness dispel demonic hordes.
Ten thousand cycles—Dao transcends all,
Merit complete, it ascends to Highest Clarity.

**Red Emperor’s Hymn of Demon-Quelling**
Three qi gather at the numinous gates,
Luminous and void, they gleam with jade cinnabar.
The Crimson Mound holds the Emperor Perfected,
Vermilion clouds fly with crimson chariots.
Governing and guiding within the ten thousand realms,
Guiding and surpassing countless eons.
Holding the whip, consulting the sacred registers,
Proclaiming the cavernous scriptures, unfolding divine chapters.
Untying knots, dispersing roots of misfortune,
Molten gold shatters the wicked and treacherous.
If the will can perfect this Dao,
Demonic trials all vanish before it.
Safeguarding passage across the kalpa’s dark ford,
Gazing in bliss through endless years.

**White Emperor’s Hymn of Demon-Quelling**
The Western Numinous turns the seven measures,
Vast and subtle, it gathers bright splendor.
White Prime sustains my spirit,
August Perfected steer the radiant clouds.
Luminous, the Three Pure Lights,
Brilliant, they shatter the hundred evils.
Drawing in sound, extending the primal qi,
Golden essence nurtures the Three Fields.
Refining and congealing, they solidify jade substance,
Precious radiance gleams with jasper brilliance.
Demon essences face annihilation’s trial,
Even to the earth’s depths, none sink or linger.
Reins loosed in the high, pure halls,
Wheels aligned with the Supreme Immortals.

**Black Emperor’s Hymn of Demon-Quelling**
Northern Mystery’s three blossoms flourish,
The Supreme Lord’s Purple Emperor resides.
Gathering qi, it governs the hidden dwellings,
Creation unfolds the numinous net.
Below, it commands the Void and Danger’s essence,
Precious nurturing in the Heavenly Origin’s chamber.
Spirit connects with the wondrously subtle,
Wrapping and guarding the hundred passes.
Vast and open, it destroys demonic trials,
Ominous disasters never dare approach.
The Great Dao preserves the natural,
Lifespan knows no loss or harm.
Through ten thousand kalpas, joyous assemblies,
In daylight, they ascend the cloud-wheels.

**Yellow Emperor’s Hymn of Demon-Quelling**
Blended transformations return to profound subtlety,
The Primal August unites the Emperor’s spirit.
The True Elder seals the Yellow Gates,
The Four Governors align with the mysterious balance.
Circular splendor soars above the Great Spread,
Together they bear the steadfast King Perfected.
Binding the ford, they secure the hundred bones,
Jasper radiance enfolds the embryonic immortals.
Morning brilliance pours into luminous scenes,
Demons respond by self-annihilating form.
Ten thousand Dao safeguard without loss,
Returning old age to youthful infancy.
Five assemblies merge into one qi,
Flying chariots transcend the Cloud Capital.

**Eulogy of the Dragon Han’s Beginning Azure Jade Calendar**
Nine yangs return the wondrous qi,
Three lights scatter the primal essence.
Emerald mists float the numinous script,
Azure groves gleam with pure blossoms.
Transcendent, they reach the Jade Clarity’s palace,
Vast and distant, Penglai’s isles.
True transformations flow without pause,
Divine winds nourish the myriad lives.

**Eulogy of the Crimson Brightness’ Cinnabar Light Jade Calendar**
Vast kalpas open divine destiny,
Dragon scripts float on crimson clouds.
Eight Mighties surge like lightning,
Nine phoenixes shatter the inauspicious.
Refining and transcending the Cinnabar Emperor’s chamber,
Ascending to the Primordial Beginning’s home.
Fiery brightness ever continues its illumination,
Numinous blessings gather in morning’s splendor.

**Eulogy of the Supreme August’s Central Numinous Jade Calendar**
Primal Yellow generates one qi,
Stirred and transformed, it congeals true form.
Supreme virtue upholds gentleness and compliance,
Embracing light, it penetrates the distant and obscure.
Establishing the center, it encompasses the Nine Poles,
Grasping the root, it governs the Three Dawns.
Resplendent at heaven’s apex,
Flying rays illuminate the jade numen.

**Eulogy of the Extending Prosperity’s Pure Numinous Jade Calendar**
The August Elder stores numinous purity,
Golden essence gleams with the Dipper’s might.
The Six Heavens are all beheaded and destroyed,
The ten thousand treasures return to hidden subtlety.
Bracing qi floats above the lofty gates,
Cold light gathers in pure radiance.
Empty Unity dons the jade bridle,
Splendid, it soars through the Nine Empyreans.

**Eulogy of the Opening August’s Mysterious Supreme Jade Calendar**
Five qi accord with the primal mystery,
All heavens blend with the Great Obscurity.
Celestial essence flies with feathered darkness,
Jade maidens scatter azure blossoms.
Purple writs seal the heavenly treasures,
Mysterious light chills the imperial court.
All demons revere the supreme transformation,
The myriad lands preserve peace and tranquility.

**Celestial Luminous Chapter**
Flying mystery, purple qi congeals the numinous root,
The net of Jade Clarity governs the myriad gods.
In the void, seething and surging, it forms naturally,
Above, tiered layers transmit the twelve transmissions.
Jasper towers, towering, shine with radiant clouds,
Flowing essence, purple gates gird the golden chariots.
Jewel halls, resplendent, encircle the eight soaring ones,
Within dwell the Nine Numinous Immortals of azure gold.
The Cinnabar August True Mother is named Essence-Extending,
Flying azure feathers crown the morning’s infant sovereign.

Holding jade tablets and grasping numinous banners,
Five-colored spirits command demons before the imperial honor.
Grasping talismanic registers at the Gate of Life,
Chewing the sun and moon, sipping from the sweet spring.
The Net of Li radiates brilliance to refine the five souls,
Internally replete and externally overflowing, the Crimson Palace rejoices.
Golden light shines resplendently, form perfectly round,
From the new moon entering metal, colors merge in primordial chaos.
Only the Enlightened One understands these words,
On the fifth day of the sun and tenth of the moon, facing the Northern Origin.
At once beholding the flowery canopy leading the immortal lords,
Purple qi swirls leftward, linking with the Dipper.
Passing through the four sevens into the Golden Gate,
Just as the Cinnabar August One reviews the myriad immortals.
Those who clearly grasp this secret with diligent effort,
Secretly recite and silently ponder, ever mindful of its divisions.
Marvelous visions respond to the essential text,
After three years, one may securely preserve long life.
After nine years, riding the void in feathered skirts,
Phoenix robes lightly soaring to ascend Dragon Mountain.
Gazing up and down at the Nine Numinous Ones to pay homage to the Jade Dawn,
One becomes a Great Perfected of the Numinous Treasure.

**Hymn to the Jade Dawn Lord of the East**
Vast and boundless, linked to the flowery gates,
Divine honor, true unity of the imperial One.
Numinous void intermingles with sun and moon,
Mysterious awakening illuminates the dark ford.
Jade Pass revolves the reckoning of fate,
Brahmic qi initiates the capital’s radiance.
Banners wave, intoning cavernous chants,
Heavenly lords wield the wheel of transformation.
Golden splendor leads the immortal registers,
Fragrant sashes gird the Dragon Mountain Palace.
Precious effulgences gleam with wondrous light,
Feasting and reveling in the loftiest walls.
Misty vapors scatter marvelous mists,
Refining essence to nurture my form.
Flying immortals observe the kalpa’s assembly,
Chanting the primordial scriptures of the Origin.
The Supreme Ultimate establishes the azure key,
Morning radiance spreads forth generation.
Luminous brilliance responds to the vaulted observance,
Joyful harmony preserves the Jade Infant.
Imperial nurturance revolves the chariot of light,
Ascending the seven ancestral souls.
Extending the net of flying principles,
Encompassing the roots of heaven and earth.
Auspicious clouds veil the towering skies,
Purple abodes of the Perfected Lords.
Lofty and serene, the Pure Mystery Palace,
Eradicating trials and expelling evil and misfortune.
The Dao responds to the primordial vastness,
Spirit congeals in the Niwan Palace’s essence.
The numinous mound’s threefold white clouds,
Interwoven radiance crisscrosses the jade peaks.
Seven nines unite in application,
Three fives combine in shared merit.
Together harmonizing the virtue of central harmony,
Transforming and refining to transcend the immortal lineage.

**Hymn to the Jade Dawn Lord of the South**
Radiant harmony shines with luminous brilliance,
Fiery splendor refines the jade countenance.
Empty Brahma veils the distant mystery,
Vast clarity reveals divine merit.
Ninefold splendor shatters the dark records,
Four poles extend the springs of life.
The Yellow Chamber abides in morning light,
Endlessly preserving long life.
Graceful and remote, the moon’s consort ascends,
Myriad realms transcend the kalpa’s wheel.
Chaotic profundity veils the jade scriptures,
Dragon Han shines with crystalline clarity.
Divine texts command the Six Heavens,
Scrutinizing and restraining demonic hordes.
Evil trials dare not approach me,
Names inscribed in the Highest Clarity.
Transcending the five sufferings,
Carefree upon the Mystery’s towering peak.
Flying spirits open the great destiny,
Beholding the ninefold layers of clouds.
Refining my soul in the southern ascent,
Revolving canopies roam the soaring groves.
Misty vapors entwine the void’s net,
Tenfold revolutions return through Heaven’s Pass.
Great demons all come as guests,
Entering the light to pay homage to the Purple Tenuity.
Dragon Abyss pours into the Eastern Well,
Yellow splendor nurtures my true self.
The Great Net’s colorless light,
Silently transcends those of boundless origin.
Vermilion spirits harmonize the supreme qi,
Grand harmony ascends the Hall of Blessings.
Mystic terrace reflects lush verdure,
Reciting cavernous scriptures, following the Western Numinous.
Divine lords spread the mysterious model,
Returning to infancy, equal to nature.

**Hymn to the Jade Dawn Lord of the West**
Cavernous spirits mirror the towering gates,
Receiving the decree, Lord of Good Life.
Numinous youths refine through fire’s trial,
Fortune’s halls traverse the springs of life.
The Great Desert clarifies the Dao’s manifestation,
Perfected ones soar upon radiant clouds.
Lofty clarity spreads the primordial transformation,
Sweeping away filth and dispelling demonic vapors.
Receiving my jade-green chariot,
Ascending into the Gate of Subtle Mystery.
Radiance raised in the vast and boundless home,
Illuminating the Ninefold Mystery’s Perfected.
Creation revolves the dark passes,
Profoundly establishing the numinous root.
The Radiant August connects lush splendor,
Reviewing and transcending immortal souls.
Towering peaks of the White Prime Youth,
Cavernously accompanying the imperial guests.
The Origin’s King within Heaven’s midst,
Silent and still, the Void’s Primordial Court.
The Jade Dawn extends the great model,
Flowing blessings to cleanse my dust.
Vaulted towers intone cavernous chants,
Binding demons and restraining ghostly forms.
Three Origins divide the ancestral transformations,
Nine degrees all proclaimed and arrayed.
White Slayer gallops through the Aligned Mounds,
Evil contracts with the verdant covenant.
The Great Saint of the Miro Net,
Reborn to ascend the banquet of blessings.
Unfettered transformation rides destiny’s return,
Erasing death to forever unite in joy.
Jewel palaces in towering realms,
Forested supports of misty flowery soarings.
Cloudy teeth receive the threefold brilliance,
Partaking of these boundless, distant years.

**Hymn to the Jade Dawn Lord of the North**
Initiating transformation, supreme spirit,
Celestial ascent congeals the mysterious qi.
Yang’s splendor, true unity’s essence,
Grand harmony nurtures wondrous wisdom.
Nine Numinous guard the Western Kunlun,
Mechanisms of transformation pause at the pivotal assembly.
Phoenix chariots ascend feathered wheels,
Surpassing the great kalpa’s ford.
Cloudy banks embrace the round and luminous,
Nurturing the Celestial Lord of Life.
Receiving talismans at the Feathered Forest Palace,
Fragrant splendor girds the numinous cloud’s lapels.
Empty skies fly the mysterious chapters,
Lifting and raising the body to transcendence.
Heavenly governance commands the Eight Radiant Ones,
Opening the path for the Nine Dark Souls.
Orchid Palace links with the Purple Tenuity,
Following the pattern to ascend Vermilion Mound.
The Southern Palace holds wondrous youths,
Jade radiance refines my form.
Azure clouds float upon the green chariot,
Celebrating and revering the lofty honor.
Numinous winds ripple through cavernous echoes,
Precious and boundless, the ageless years.
Nine immortals bestow the registers of destiny,
Releasing and dispersing the roots of past karma.
Flying principles resist the empty Brahma,
Expansively attaining the nameless return.
The Great Chaos records the hundred bones,
Lingering mists merge with purple clouds.
Blessings descend to seven generations of descendants,
Misfortunes block the threefold sources of calamity.
Untying the sash to depart the dusty net,
Equal reins join the carefree guests.
In an instant, ascending the Dragon Terrace,
Bowing before the Jade Emperor.

**Hymn to the Seven Perfected**

The Supreme Most Transcendent and Mysterious School,
Expounds the Dao and reveres its scriptures.
With a single bow and glance, one attains immortality,
Through countless kalpas, ageless years endure.
Majestic is the Great Sage’s virtue,
Silent and still, rooted in non-being.
Celestial radiance weaves empty structures,
Riding the void in natural ascent.
Sun and moon blaze with brilliance,
Peace and harmony bring endless joy.
To learn immortality, sever worldly desires,
Each thought accumulates in succession.
Coming and going disturb my spirit,
Restless, it traverses all without cease.
Extinguish thoughts within the void,
Whispering into silent emptiness.
Seek the scriptures as if parched with thirst,
Hold resolve firm as metal and stone.
Preserve the path to flying immortality,
The Five Numinous Ones bestow registers of passage.
Fulfill my Six Perfections,
Thus dissolving the Three Nets.
In purity, worship the Primal Simplicity,
Exhale and inhale to nurture the cloud-sprout.
Carefree within the Golden Gates,
Jade Capital becomes my home.
Naturally, the Seven Treasures arise,
Each person seated upon a lotus.
Gazing up, I chew the immortal fruits of Xuandu,
Bending down, I savor the hollow melons of the void.
Divine countenance shines like the crimson sun,
Why reckon the multitude of kalpas?
The dharma drum summons the assembly of immortals,
The tolling bell subdues the great demons.
A sacred breeze fans wondrous blossoms,
Resplendent, unfurling rich robes.
Heavenly Perfected strum the cloud zither,
All Perfected pluck the numinous harp.
Elegant songs of the Three Heavens’ radiance,
Scatter wisdom through the Jade Flower Grove.
Seven generations of ancestors ascend to the Hall of Blessings,
Henceforth treading the mysterious tones.
If past-life blessings were insufficient,
This scripture remains distant and hard to find.
Sincerity in the Dao knows no end,
Yet those who plot flight may sink again.
The Supreme Dao of Non-Action,
Its vastness resides in the hearts of all.
To learn the Dao, trust in the cinnabar faith,
Revere your master as your closest kin.
Draw in the radiance to accompany pure splendor,
Diligently renewing with each passing day.
Though the multitudes may not attain deliverance,
Neither shall I be left undelivered.
Great vows demand profound recompense,
Mysterious virtue must surely be true.
Hidden virtue’s transgressions run deep,
Confronting them turns the wheel anew.
To learn the Dao is also most arduous,
Day and night, cultivate the field of blessings.
Planting blessings is like planting trees,
Heaped baskets form a mountain.
If you can immerse yourself in the mysterious and exalted,
You shall soar to the Pure Heavens.
Cultivate the Dao of Non-Action,
And you shall bind the great covenant.
The Supreme’s most recondite scripture,
Is called the *Chapter of Wisdom*.
To relieve suffering depends on one’s capacity,
Transcending the mundane to attain the Real.
A numinous countenance is no marvel in this world,
Like a lotus in the depths of an abyss.
Each person’s conduct has its root,
All stemming from past-life merit.
Establish virtue while the time is ripe,
Make vows, and none shall go unanswered.
Good and evil both await their retribution,
The principle of rise and fall is unfathomable.
The worthy uphold the Dharma’s words,
Yet the Dao also lies in forgetting both.
To comprehend this is great wisdom,
Ascending to become the Venerable of the Supreme Ultimate.
Jewel canopies linked with jade pendants,
Commanding chariots drawn by nine dragons.
Golden blossoms hold the Cavern Scriptures,
Offering incense, cherishing the immortal youths.
Whistling songs resound through Xuandu,
Striking jade to chime the jeweled bells.
Rising to soar through the Great Clarity,
Transcending radiance, roaming the cloudy skies.
Upholding the Dharma’s words,
Wandering the mysterious ultimate in freedom.
Ten thousand kalpas are but last night,
A thousand autumns like the morning dawn.
Towering, shading the cloudy blossoms,
Hand grasping the branches of the Treasure Grove.
Incense smoke arises naturally,
The mysterious steps need no ascent.
Sacred banners disperse in due time,
Proliferating thoughts dissolve in their season.
Extinguish wisdom to expand the Great Chaos,
Non-Action becomes the pure hymn.

**Opening the Altar Hymn**
Vast and formless, the empty void,
Endless, moved by the utmost numen.
Reverence invokes Heaven’s favor,
Neglect invites demonic intrusion.
Fortune and misfortune turn with fate,
Adversity and prosperity arise from conditions.
The Dao does not prize pearls or jade,
The spirits respond only to utmost sincerity.
Redoubling devotion with diligence,
Praying earnestly with profound feeling.
Naturally, the Great Dao is attained,
All receive the descent of true numina.
Pinching incense to state my wishes,
Bowing my head, I hope for auspicious blessings.
The Heavenly Worthy ever abides in serene stillness,
Turning my heart, I worship the distant and obscure.

**Closing the Altar Hymn**
The great void encompasses all forms,
The utmost Dao is subtle and formless.
Harmonizing with the wondrous qi,
Resonance reaches the depths of feeling.
In an instant, pervading the eight directions,
Vaguely, the myriad numina descend.
Humbly presenting plain offerings,
Submitting my being to express sincere devotion.
Far and wide, the phoenix canopy soars,
From afar, grasping the brocade banner of the simurgh.
The misty palace stands lofty and lush,
The rosy pavilion rests high and still.
The jade chariot emerges from the celestial river,
The golden dragon enters the Great Clarity.
Sweet dew descends upon the mortal world,
Auspicious blessings reach the hidden and obscure.

**Hymn to Invoke the Mysterious Master**
The liturgy’s strictures are solemnly observed,
Sincerity is offered to the hundred spirits.
Presenting words to express earnest wishes,
A pure offering answers the lofty heavens.
Gazing down, the cloud chariot descends,
With a tranquil heart, I summon the Supreme Perfected.
The Mysterious Master, Lord of All Teachings,
I humbly request your descent to the mortal realm.

**Hymn to Invoke the Heavenly Master**
The Supreme Most transmitted the registers,
Initially at Crane’s Cry Mountain.
Accumulated merit surpassed the jade tablets,
Ranked to attend the Three Clarities.
Presenting the scripture of guidance,
Fulfilling the sentiments of common folk.
When performing the purification rite, I shall make this invocation,
Hoping you will deign to witness my sincerity.

**Hymn to Invoke the Inspector of Purifications**
Your sacred name remains in the mortal world,
Your immortal rank is listed in the Upper Clarity.
Three thousand merits are already complete,
Eight hundred deeds were accomplished first.
Ritual repentance cultivates true blessings,
Overseeing the purification as witness.
Tonight, the cloud chariot descends,
Auspicious blessings bestowed upon all beings.

**Hymn to Invoke the Heavenly Officials**
The wondrous Dao imparts true teachings,
Performing purifications to establish fields of blessings.
Erecting the altar to worship the Supreme Sages,
Convening the lofty immortals in grand offering.
Concentrated thoughts reach the celestial extremes,
Spirit and essence move the Supreme Mystery.
The Heavenly Officials ride jeweled chariots,
Their colorful retinues descend to the mortal feast.

**Hymn to Invoke the Earthly Officials**
Reverently presenting sincere devotion,
Earnestly gazing toward the Purple Void.
Praying to convey the aspirations of the mortal realm,
Wishing to reach the Earth Sovereign.
In hidden response, bestowing true protection,
From afar, descending with the register of pardoned sins.
The Earthly Officials arrive in descent,
Swiftly surrounded by five-cloud chariots.

**Hymn to Invoke the Water Officials**
With expedient means, unfolding true transformation,
Compassionately establishing sacred rites.
With an empty heart, cultivate the wondrous assembly,
Harmonizing qi, chanting numinous songs.
Silently praying to the abyssal court,
Sincere devotion reaches the Great Net.
The Water Officials descend with dragon chariots,
Cloud brocade rising from the azure waves.

**Hymn to Invoke the Five Emperors**
The Five Emperors dwell among the immortals,
Rectifying the causes of good and evil.
Auspicious light illumines the cosmos,
Benevolent grace rescues the sunken.
Revealing faults to pray for true protection,
With a tranquil heart, moved by the sages.
Both the living and the dead attain joy,
Enjoying blessings without end.

**Hymn to Invoke the Scripture Master**
Entering the retreat to cultivate the Yellow Register,
Solemnly adorned to summon the Supreme Immortals.
Presenting the memorial first to the throne,
Words of sincerity await proclamation.

**Hymn to Invoke the Register Master**
With solemn reverence, we pray for pure blessings,
In orderly ranks, we form the precious retreat.
Tonight we ascend the altar,
Walking the Dao in ceaseless procession.
Though wishes are already made manifest,
The eye of the Dao opens to those who turn their hearts.
The Register Master descends,
His immortal retinue alighting from the Jasper Terrace.

**Hymn to Invoke the Ordination Master**
With scriptures and precepts, we pray with a cinnabar heart,
In utmost sincerity, we summon the hundred spirits.
Holding incense, we entreat the Perfected Sages,
Upholding precepts, we invoke the Immortal Perfected.
Pure chants rise at dawn’s first light,
Diligent meditation persists into the night.
The Ordination Master descends,
To protect and bless those who keep the retreat.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Mystic Master**
The Celestial Thearch commands the Perfected Immortals,
To cultivate the retreat at the Yellow Register altar.
The hosts of heaven descend,
As incense is burned to repent transgressions.
Having prayed for grace and completed the ritual,
The retreat’s affairs are now fulfilled.
Vast fortune remains in the mortal realm,
While the Mystic Master ascends to the Nine Heavens.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Celestial Master**
The retreat’s blessings are now perfected,
The memorial ascends to the Nine Heavens.
Utmost sincerity evokes response,
The entire household attains longevity.
The Register-Keepers of the heavens stand guard,
The memorial’s words reach the Celestial Throne.
Ancestors are uplifted and delivered,
Descendants rejoice in honor and promotion.
The Three Heavens’ Protector of the Teachings,
Having completed the rites, reports the accomplishment.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Retreat Overseer**
The numinous altar upholds the Dharma seat,
Reliant on the Overseer’s descent to supervise.
Correcting faults while recording good deeds,
Even the Perfected Immortals revere and admire.
Soon the Daoist cavalcade will depart,
Vanishing into the depths of the five-colored clouds.
The living shall find support,
And the departed shall be delivered from darkness.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Heavenly Official**
With wondrous discipline, the retreat is conducted,
The luminous precepts wash away the roots of sin.
Gazing upward, we revere the supreme good,
Pouring forth earnest words in humble supplication.
Having submitted to the retreat’s refuge,
We are graced with boundless pardon and favor.
The Heavenly Official returns to the Jade Palace,
His precious chariot entering the Golden Gate.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Earthly Official**
The floating assembly concludes its audience with the Origin,
The Three Paths bear their karmic fruits.
True grace is proclaimed across the Five Peaks,
Sincere devotion is presented to the Three Heavens.
The ritual mat is rolled, the ancestral rites ended,
The altar is dismantled, the host of immortals sent forth.
The Earthly Official returns to his mountain abode,
Ascending high in his five-cloud chariot.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Water Official**
The proclamation of the numinous sounds is complete,
The immortals return to the upper heavens.
Spiritual light dispels calamities,
Sweet dew descends with the true wind.
The Black Dragon Chariot receives its mandate,
Returning afar to the Supreme Treasure Palace.
The Water Official retires to his grotto palace,
Bestowing boundless fortune and prosperity.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Five Emperors**
The immortal retinue arrives from the celestial heights,
Solemnly descending to the five directions.
Inspecting the vapors, they sound their feathered batons,
Their simurgh chariots pause in the purified space.
As the retreat nears its conclusion,
Their carriages return to the heavens above.
Their flowing grace knows no bounds,
How could it be merely for the fragrance of incense?

**Hymn to Send Forth the Scripture Master**
Though the scriptural Dharma is subtle and wondrous,
Its reverence depends entirely on the master.
All who establish goodness,
Frequently pay homage to him.
When qi flows, merit is easily achieved;
When the heart is negligent, regret comes too late.
If one can diligently maintain mindfulness,
Morning and evening, one will naturally soar as an immortal.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Register Master**
The Dao holds the retreat in highest esteem,
The Dharma regards audience as constant practice.
Those who neither cultivate nor uphold it,
How can they reach the Celestial Realm?
With the right bones, one enters the immortal ranks,
Naturally opening the Purple Chamber.
The Dark Warrior arrays his numinous chariot,
And one beholds the Golden Palace Hall.

**Hymn to Send Forth the Ordination Master**
Far away stands the Jade Capital Mountain,
How towering is the Mystic Metropolis!
Brightly the long night unfolds,
The Perfected One rides the void.
The Great Dao is propagated by people,
When the heart is devoted, the spirits naturally return.
Having completed the retreat and walked the Dao,
We bow our heads and take leave of the Three Masters.

**Hymn of the Bright Lamp**
The light of the Orthodox Unity,
Flares upward in vermilion smoke.

**Hymn of the Radiant Youths**
Twelve Luminous Youths stand revealed,
Their light pervading heaven and earth,
Illumining our very selves.
A hundred evils crumble and fall,
Ten thousand ghosts retreat in fear.
Bright radiance shines through all,
Communing with the true and numinous.
The Most High scatters light in every direction,
Vermilion lamps convey sincerity.
All heavens are fully illumined,
All earthly realms grow bright and clear.
My body, too, shines with light,
My five viscera blossom with splendor.
Scorching sunlight ascends the Great Void,
Distant thoughts reach the Jade Capital.
Cinnabar essence abides in the Supreme Origin,
Mysterious yang resounds in the empty sky.
Greed’s form severs the root of suffering,
Subtle and wondrous, the true thought arises.
Hanging blossoms bear no fruit,
Causes and conditions forever formless.
My body is likewise,
Riding transformation, borne by flowing light.
The night’s glow marks the Cinnabar Yang,
Far and distant, it illumines the void.
All heavens beam with radiant countenances,
All yin shadows instantly dissolve.
My spirit, too, grows keen and bright,
Ever delighting in wisdom and insight.
Carefree, I traverse the Dao’s workings,
Shifting and yielding to heaven’s decree.
Raising my form, I tread the empty vastness,
Night’s torch dries the flowing essence.

**Hymn to Extinguish the Lamps**
Mysterious yin seals the light,
The eternal lamp continues its brightness.
The Great Yang now shines forth,
The Eight Darknesses open to purity.
The lamp returns to the Great Yin,
Its light clings to the arising radiance.
The Two Perfected of Sun and Moon
Merge as one within me.

**Hymn of Wisdom**
Wisdom gives rise to the root of precepts,
The true Dao takes precepts as its master.
From this, the Three Treasures flourish,
Revered and received by lofty immortals.
Sailing this deathless vessel,
Swiftly one crosses the vast expanse.
At this moment of expounding precepts,
All heavens come to bow their heads.
Wisdom arises from original non-being,
Brightly illuminating the ten directions.
Binding emptiness, it towers in the mystic firmament,
All heavens draw from its flowing fragrance.
Its wonder defies thought and speech,
Its numinous resonance truly and subtly pervades.
Being culminates in non-being,
Non-being contains all without exception.
Wisdom constantly observes the body,
The foremost task in learning the Dao.
Vast and boundless, it roams freely,
Naturally recording my spirit.
The Heavenly Worthy ever protects and shelters,
The Demon King pledges his guardianship.
Resplendent is the Vajra body,
Transcendent, the Most High immortal.

**Hymn of Upholding the Precepts**
The Dao takes non-mind as its essence,
All acts become fields of merit.
Establishing merit has no fixed measure,
Each follows their original vow.
Emptying oneself to respond to beings,
Focus the mind without partiality.
The Great Sage exalts the true teaching,
Just as rain descends from heaven.
Lofty and towering, none are left untouched,
Ever humble, thus forming the abyss.
The sea is king of a hundred rivers,
For it can relinquish the dragon’s scales.
Through ten thousand kalpas, wisdom is preserved,
How could it be limited to this lifetime?
Upholding precepts without the slightest lapse,
Lifetimes of good karmic bonds are formed.
Concentrate thought on the Great Vehicle,
And you shall embody the Dao’s truth.

**Hymn of Returning the Precepts**
The Heavenly Worthy, vast in compassion,
Expounds the precepts to deliver beings.
Majestic virtue pervades the hidden and manifest,
Karmic retribution moves the true numina.
All heavens come to bow their heads,
All demons restrain their forms.
The past transcends the Eight Difficulties,
The present safeguards a thousand years.
When the merit of the retreat is complete,
Together we send forth our reverence.
Flowing Sanskrit, ethereal cloud-chants,
Flying incense mingles with fragrant smoke.
Jade phoenixes ride cinnabar carriages,
Golden dragons draw emerald chariots.
In life and death, all find joy,
Families and nations all know peace.

**Hymn of Burning Incense**
In learning the Dao, be diligent and earnest,
Gather faith and circulate cinnabar sincerity.
Burn incense and take refuge in the Most High,
True qi blends with fragrant smoke.
May it open the great pardon,
Freeing the seven ancestors from dark realms.

**Hymn of the Supreme Ultimate**
The Dao takes purification as foremost,
Diligent practice ascends the Golden Portal.
Thus is the great Dharma bridge established,
Universally delivering all beings.
Repaying the kindness of past lives,
The heart of the Dao arises transcendent.
The body soars to the immortal capital,
The seven ancestors all attain liberation.

**Hymn of Presenting the Petition**
The Most High’s Dharma is subtle and wondrous,
Petitions and registers deliver humans and heavens.
The Primordial Beginning announces the talismanic decree,
At the appointed hour, one attains ascension.
Transmission saves the drowning,
All achieve self-cultivation.
Inscribing names on the Golden Petition,
Carefree before the Jade Emperor.

**Hymn of the Deliverance Petition**
Vermilion brightness unfolds the mystic chart,
Harmonious and smooth, it reaches the upper void.
The Primordial Beginning spreads the numinous scripture,
Ten divisions of flying celestial texts.
Opening deliverance for the nine dark ancestors,
A myriad recitations, the Dao naturally abides.
Jade peaks adorn the jeweled forest,
Life and death dwell in the abode of merit and virtue.
Without the Yellow Register Petition,
How could the root of suffering be severed?
Circumambulating, reciting the numinous scripture,
The Five Numinous Ones return to assist.

**Hymn of Burning the Petition**
Beings abound in obstacles and hardships,
The Great Dao truly pities and cherishes them.
Deliverance extends through ritual teachings,
All are enabled to repent their karmic bonds.
Transgressions fill the earthly prisons,
Offenses have reached the heavens.
Revealing them, I pray for true protection,
With a hidden heart, I move the sages.
Reverently bowing to the Three Treasures,
May I soon ascend to heaven and enjoy long years.
Burning the petition, I return it to the upper realms,
Presenting names before the Jade Emperor.

**Hymn of Burning the Memorial**
Sacred virtue flows through ritual teachings,
Cultivating the retreat brings long life and fortune.
Extending life by transferring the Jade Petition,
Requesting destiny by presenting the Golden Scroll.
Sinful names vanish from the Northern Bureau,
Living registers are inscribed in the Southern Prosperity.
The living all find joy,
The departed are born in the land of fortune.

**Hymn of Welcoming the Perfected**
The Heavenly Worthy mounts the celestial dragon,
A million immortals ride as his retinue.
Clouds arise in carefree ascent,
Jade tones form the music of flutes and drums.
Flower garlands and wish-fulfilling jewels,
Sacred transformations beyond thought.
May they deign to descend upon the jade altar,
Bestowing blessings upon all beings.

**Hymn of Sending Forth the Perfected**
The returning chariot of five-colored clouds,
Soaring with the ninefold hymns.
In an instant, they ascend far into heaven,
The altar’s incense lingers in abundance.
Mysterious grace blankets the cosmos,
Fortune and blessings pervade mountains and rivers.
Gazing afar at the immortal path,
Carefree, they ascend the Great Loftiness.

**Hymn of Sending Forth the Direct Petition Messenger**
I reverently invoke the Direct Petition Messenger,
Hidden and manifest paths secretly connect.
Riding clouds, hastening to present the casket,
Far traversing the Three Realms.
The Purple Clarity and Golden Portal are profound,
The Mystic Metropolis and Water Palace abide.
Transmission is swift as a moment,
The upright petition awaits the true wind.

**Hymn of Universal Offering**
Universally offering to the boundless sages,
Fragrant smoke scatters in the ten directions.
May they ascend the Seven Treasures Terrace,
Shedding light upon the Five Turbid Worlds.
Delivering the hosts of humans and heavens,
All are enabled to mount the Dharma bridge.
Together we realize non-action,
Diligently cultivating without retreat.

**Hymn of the Northern Emperor**
Excellent is the Primordial Beginning, the Venerable One,
The compassionate father and mother of all beings.
Inclining his light from the Purple Tenuity Palace,
Bending to illuminate the nine dark portals.
Towering is the cold courtyard of Mount Qiu,
Its reflection expands the icy shores.
Fiery flames rage in the scorching hells,
Abundantly he showers the Dharma rain.
All-pervading, his great compassion and wisdom,
Ever skillfully relieving the suffering of the multitude.

**Deliverance of Long-Night Souls**
Now delivered from the endless night, they bow in reverence.

**Hymn of Huaxia**
Diligently observing fasts and precepts,
Reciting scriptures to restrain the six passions.
Thus they ride the void and soar,
Radiant, ascending to Jade Clarity.
With focused heart they keep the fasts,
Exhaling and inhaling to refine the five spirits.
Inner virtue crowns the heavens,
Turning the wheel to become perfected immortals.

**Hymn of Dao-Seekers**
To seek the Dao, action is urgent;
To uphold precepts is to master the heart.
In emptiness and equanimity, the true *qi* abides,
Where immortals and sages naturally converge.

**Hymn in Praise of the Dao’s Manifestation**

**Hymn in Praise of the Dharma’s Exposition**

**Hymn in Praise of the Arts’ Exposition**

**Hymn to the Scripture of Purity and Stillness**
The Five Ultimates take primacy,
The void and nothingness are the Dao’s spontaneity.
The Primordial Origin governs the ancestral norm,
Its wondrous essence harmonizes with the mysterious and profound.
Expounding the teachings to clarify the Supreme,
Understanding constancy through metaphorical explication.
Through this pure and still virtue,
The scriptures are established to propagate transformation.

The Great Dao conceals itself in form,
True essence blends into the obscure.
The Two Modes divide at the first sign,
A single qi circulates without cease.
Encompassing and sustaining—truly unfathomable,
Nurturing and generating—oh, how serene!
Fashioning and shaping, the Artisan of things,
All creatures, though dull, contain the numinous.
Sun and moon traverse the void,
Bright and luminous, most impartial.
Those who attain heaven endure in radiance,
Illuminating all things, universally penetrating.
Tangible things receive light’s illumination,
Insentient beings merge with form’s fusion.
Yin and yang constantly embody the Dao,
Unceasing within the Great Vastness.

The wondrous Dao is truly hard to name,
Yet it embraces and generates the myriad things.
Circulating through time, it fills the earth’s veins,
Freely bestowed, it receives heaven’s clarity.
Breathing forth the true message,
The Great Transformation achieves harmony.
Returning to oneness in perfect communion,
High and low lie level and even.
Formless, utterly without trace,
Hard to name within the primordial chaos.
Before the emergence of heaven, earth, and sun,
How could there be rain, clouds, or wind?
Breaking open the signs of the primordial chaos,
Piercing through the obscurity of things’ forms.
Thereby dividing and creating,
Provisionally establishing the boundless Dao.
The clear and turbid qi of yin and yang,
Circulating, surging above and below.
Naturally accomplishing transformation,
Ultimately harmonizing in perfect communion.
The myriad kinds nurtured and reared,
The Three Origins conjoined in unity.
Heaven and earth in harmonious union,
All gathered in the One True Emptiness.

At the inception, the Two Modes divided,
Humanity and the numinous—most noble and revered.
The Three Powers stabilize the cosmos,
The Two Forces determine heaven and earth.
All things contain the true qi,
The primordial is the gateway to true reality.
Hard and soft mutually complement in function,
Who can abide in embodying the Dao?
Descending to the root, one penetrates the true body,
Returning to the origin, one perceives the end’s cause.
Spring’s yang spreads luxuriant flourishing,
Autumn’s season governs withering and decline.
The Supreme Ultimate generates form and transformation,
In pure harmony, it renews creation.
The pivot of the great mechanism propels the great movement,
Entrusted to the divine, it accomplishes its work.
The principle of purity and stillness is profound,
Who can fathom its ultimate depths?

Beholding emptiness, one eliminates all realms,
Cutting off forms, one comprehends all minds.
The moon of wisdom flows in the cinnabar river,
The cloud of compassion covers the emerald peaks.
Abiding in stillness, one remains unmoved,
Responding to things, one manifests as a knowing friend.
When one awakens to constant purity and stillness,
One knows the wondrous mechanism of the sagely origin.
The Great Beginning is free from defilement,
In perfect quiescence, its radiance concealed.
Silently, it enfolds the sand-realm,
Dimly, it penetrates the Purple Tenuity.
After the Three Origins’ ascent and descent,
Heaven and earth all return to it.

The mind is the numinous abode,
The spirit rests in stillness, finding peace.
Greed, anger, and delusion easily arise,
Precepts, concentration, and wisdom are hard to behold.
The profound essentials lie in perfect uprightness,
Firmly maintaining inner tranquility.
Ever free from the six desires,
The Dharma-realm naturally expands.
If one dispels all passions and desires,
The mind becomes clear, wondrously penetrating all.
In unity with the real, not clinging to things,
Returning to stillness, abandoning all attachments.

Water, distant, connects to heaven in stillness,
Mountains, high, wear the moon’s chill.
In perfect communion, wisdom is all-penetrating,
Within the pot, the golden pellet revolves.
Right mindfulness is without bias,
In emptiness, it harmonizes with spontaneity.
The six senses’ dust instantly ceases,
The three poisons’ afflictions must be healed.
The wondrous Dao transcends kalpas of emptiness,
Preserving the spirit, one ascends to heaven.
In this subtle and mysterious place,
The Mysterious Female naturally endures.
Losing the way, one strays from home,
All because one’s own light is obscured.
The mind, floating, is easily moved,
Familiar realms are hard to forget.
How can one dispel the defilements of desire?
Devious cunning only leads to desolation.
Turning the head, one finds the place of awakening,
Reflecting inward, one beholds the King of Emptiness.
Awakened to all the leaks of dust,
The Dao-eye opens clearly.
Forms and sounds are not obstacles,
Knowledge and perception must be buried.
When the spirit is still, a thousand calamities vanish,
When the mind is empty, ten thousand cares turn to ash.
The pure wind passes through the jade door,
Naturally, sweet sounds arrive.

Beholding all forms as non-form,
Their essence is but a kind of nothingness.

Within lies the true Dharma-realm,
Its essence merges with the Great Void.
Clouds still, the toad’s light reveals,
The pool so clear, white silk unfurls.

Such manifest signs—where seek another path?
In silent illumination, all things observed:
How could the myriad spirits differ?
In shared truth, none can be seen,
Beyond all traces, none can imitate.

The elder in the hall, clear and bright,
Rests beyond all dharma—nothing more.
Mysterious, mysterious, mystery dissolved,
The eight directions stretch unbounded.
The vast expanse of true emptiness revealed,
Looking back—no single thing remains.

Fused as the great desert,
Profoundly still, its nature is void.
Luminous and ever-silent,
Perfectly penetrating, its nature flows free.
Within and without as one,
Not returning to the primal origin.

When the mind is empty of things,
Even "nothingness" is truly nothing.
Why labor to dispel delusion?
What need to discern fine from coarse?

From stillness and emptiness, skill arises,
Returning to truth, unwavering.
Such subtle messages—who dares name or shape them?
All dharmas are inherently empty,
"Nothingness" and "nothingness" unite in sacred work.

Profoundly serene, neither within nor without,
Silent, east and west dissolve.
Where mind and realm both forgotten,
Square and round become one.

Vast and obscure, beyond creation,
All things freely pass through.
Provisional stillness serves as body,
Yet one must still remove the roots of desire.
When conditions are forgotten, thus stilled,
True stillness renews itself.

Accord with the unborn dharma,
Only then does one know the spring of endless day.
Alone transcending heaven and earth,
Freely at ease, unbounded.
Once settled, one reaches true constancy,
The spirit’s light beyond all measure.

Illuminating the chamber of the three poisons,
Piercing the halls of the five luminaries.
The jewel moon shines in the clear sky,
Deluded clouds vanish in an instant.
The pure wind spreads its message,
Responding to things, it unfolds at will.

Through endless kalpas, ever perfected,
Neither darkness nor light.
The Valley Spirit remains eternally still,
The Dharma-ocean serene and clear.

Right mindfulness enters the true path,
A settled mind attains the wondrous course.
Forever freed from the bonds of birth and death,
The three realms stretch wide for wandering.

Having stilled sound and trace,
Deeply penetrating the profound principle:
True emptiness—can it be attained?
True form requires no cultivation.

Let eating and pecking pass as they may,
Dignity and conduct follow freely.
Suddenly, all deliberation ceases,
In tranquility, wholeness is preserved.

To awaken the transformation of beings,
All manifold pursuits must be relinquished.
Instantly transcending the fruit of no-leakage,
How could there be any root or cause?

Grasping and rejecting cannot move it,
Causes and conditions too are cut off.
In a flash, all is let go—
The sacred path may then be transmitted.

The superior person knows no contention,
Diligently and constantly holds firm resolve.
Dwelling in truth, ever at ease,
Cultivating simplicity, hidden in profound mystery.

Looking up and down, observing heaven’s principle,
Through prosperity and adversity, penetrating the depths of the Dao.
Alas for those who remain unenlightened,
Competing in dharmas, their minds obscured.

Virtue’s transformation seeks no reward,
Grace is wide—how could one be proud?
Concealing one’s light, treasuring great capacity,
The bright nature shines like solid ice.

Silently in accord with the high and distant,
Deeply penetrating the vastness of the supreme Dao.
How could it resemble the foolish who cling,
Forcing distinctions, boasting of their abilities?

Most beings turn from the Dao,
Inverted, seeking outside.
Delusion arises from this,
The true spirit obscured and lost.

Originally lacking nothing,
Why forcefully cling to cultivation?
With a sudden sweep, the clouds of delusion disperse,
The silver toad shines upon the jade tower.

Scheming arises from delusion,
Departing from truth disturbs the spirit.
All because the mind harbors love and desire,
Attaching to things, giving rise to greed and anger.

Ever harboring the fire of ignorance,
Adding the dust of affliction.
From this, retribution is received,
Revolving through the six paths in suffering.

From delusion arise anger and desire,
Greed and ignorance become obstacles.
Sorrow and worry bind endlessly,
Afflictions coil without cease.

Thus the true Dao is obscured,
From this, karmic transgressions arise.
Turning the light inward in reflection,
One awakens to the wondrous within.

Afflictions arise from thoughts—
When has one ever awakened to one’s own mind?
Vast and confused, suffering humiliation,
Disturbed and restless, unwilling to reflect.

Dying in vain without respite,
Living emptily until now.
Thus the true Dao is lost,
Dreams and illusions encroach.

If one connects with heaven and earth,
All are sustained by the Dao’s qi.
Hiding the root, deepening the stem,
Extinguishing the poisons, returning the hun to peace.

Having awakened to the path of long life,
One must open the gate of enduring vision.
Preserving truth, the spirit transforms itself,
The supreme Dharma King is revered.

Through comprehension, one ascends to the realm of kalpas.

All converge in the Great Cavern to fathom the profound plan.

Primordial Heaven and Earth—one vast emptiness.

Through myriad methods and thousand gates, waste their minds.
Chanting the Great Cavern Scripture ten thousand times,
The Jade Emperor and Laozi become their true kin.

Scholars, warriors, and officials,
Courtesans, commoners, and all alike—
All may follow their hearts to hold the Great Cavern,
Severing karmic roots to wander with the gods.

The Great Cavern’s true essence differs from other scriptures,
Ascending as immortals, entering as sages, to meet the Mysterious Perfected.

Alas, the foolish and unenlightened,
